newsitem.title: UK: Mepc confirms Hammerson talks end.
newsitem.headline: Mepc confirms Hammerson talks end.

text.p: British property company MEPC Plc said on Tuesday it had terminated talks on a possible merger with rival Hammerson Plc.

"The board of MEPC note the reports in the weekend press and confirm that MEPC and Hammerson recently had preliminary discussions about a possible merger but these talks were terminated two weeks ago," MEPC said in a statement. The company gave no further details.
Newspaper reports at the weekend said the talks had broken up but that MEPC was still open to a bid proposal from Hammerson.
